Name: Nutrients for Life
About the game: Nutrients for Life is a fun VR experience that teaches kids who have never been near a farm about the right nutrients and the right rate of application for a crop. Players must balance Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium and Water, to ensure an ideal yield, economic benefit, and environmental impact!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Nutrients for Life? Check out the release date (Sep 14, 2018), developer insights from MAMMOTH, and a complete game summary.
